titleproper.value: Guide to the Harry R. Gudenberg Collection <num>MC.296</num>

creation.value: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace <date>2019-08-08T19:19:27</date>

abstract.value: The Harry R. Gudenberg Collection contains a 1957-1958 NYU Log booklet, a "1961 NYU Frosh" pin, and a program for the 1958 NYU School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance Evening Freshman Orientation event. Gudenberg was a student at NYU, serving as the Junior Class Secretary-Treasurer for the Evening Student Council in 1958.

p.value: Identification of item, date (if known); Harry R. Gudenberg Collection; MC 296; box number; folder number; New York University Archives, New York University.
Donated by Henry Gudenberg in August 2018. The accession number associated with this gift is 2019.071.

Harry R. Gudenberg was born in 1933. He graduated with a Bachelor of Science from New York University in 1960 and received his Master of Business Administration from New York University in 1964. He went on to receive a Juris Doctor from Seton Hall University in 1970. He has worked as an arbitrator and mediator.

This collection contains Henry R. Gudenberg's 1958 NYU School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance Evening Freshman Orientation program of events, a 1957-1958 NYU Log booklet which provided in-coming students with basic school information and activities, and a "1961 NYU Frosh" pin.

corpname.value: New York University. School of Commerce, Accounts, and Finance.
